name: FakeFaith Lite
author: joey
description:
Category: Video Game Textures
Purpose: Pixel Art
Pretrained: 2x_Faithful-Lite

An attempt at recreating the "faithful" style without using the faithful dataset -- aka keeping the "pixel art" style of pixel art.
dataset: Spongebob Season 11 frames, downscaled 50% with NN for the HR, and 50% NN again for the LR
